node.title: How I became a professional self-taught developer in Germany while working a full time job

node.title: How to Fix Webpack Dynamic Import with Wrong Path
node.summary: When using the dynamic import for code splitting you'll need to specify the publicPath option to let Webpack know where your assets are.

node.title: TLDR How to prevent layout shifts from image loading in 2021
node.summary: Preventing layout shifts when loading images has never been easier.
